advancement.createnuclear.graphite_rod.d: Combine graphite and steel ingots in a mechanical crafter to make graphite rods
block.createnuclear.reactor_input.toolti: Insert _uranium_ and _graphite_ rods in large quantities to power _the reactor_
_The Reactor Input_ is a _block_ that can be used to insert _Uranium_ and _Graphite_ rods into the _Reactor_
